004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.system;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix;
008import edu.wpi.first.math.Num;
009import edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1;
010
011@SuppressWarnings("ClassTypeParameterName")
012public class LinearSystem<States extends Num, Inputs extends Num, Outputs extends Num> {
013  /** Continuous system matrix. */
014  @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
015  private final Matrix<States, States> m_A;
016
017  /** Continuous input matrix. */
018  @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
019  private final Matrix<States, Inputs> m_B;
020
021  /** Output matrix. */
022  @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
023  private final Matrix<Outputs, States> m_C;
024
025  /** Feedthrough matrix. */
026  @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
027  private final Matrix<Outputs, Inputs> m_D;
028
029  /**
030   * Construct a new LinearSystem from the four system matrices.
031   *
032   * @param a The system matrix A.
033   * @param b The input matrix B.
034   * @param c The output matrix C.
035   * @param d The feedthrough matrix D.
036   */
037  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
038  public LinearSystem(
039      Matrix<States, States> a,
040      Matrix<States, Inputs> b,
041      Matrix<Outputs, States> c,
042      Matrix<Outputs, Inputs> d) {
043    this.m_A = a;
044    this.m_B = b;
045    this.m_C = c;
046    this.m_D = d;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Returns the system matrix A.
051   *
052   * @return the system matrix A.
053   */
054  public Matrix<States, States> getA() {
055    return m_A;
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Returns an element of the system matrix A.
060   *
061   * @param row Row of A.
062   * @param col Column of A.
063   * @return the system matrix A at (i, j).
064   */
065  public double getA(int row, int col) {
066    return m_A.get(row, col);
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Returns the input matrix B.
071   *
072   * @return the input matrix B.
073   */
074  public Matrix<States, Inputs> getB() {
075    return m_B;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Returns an element of the input matrix B.
080   *
081   * @param row Row of B.
082   * @param col Column of B.
083   * @return The value of the input matrix B at (i, j).
084   */
085  public double getB(int row, int col) {
086    return m_B.get(row, col);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Returns the output matrix C.
091   *
092   * @return Output matrix C.
093   */
094  public Matrix<Outputs, States> getC() {
095    return m_C;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Returns an element of the output matrix C.
100   *
101   * @param row Row of C.
102   * @param col Column of C.
103   * @return the double value of C at the given position.
104   */
105  public double getC(int row, int col) {
106    return m_C.get(row, col);
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Returns the feedthrough matrix D.
111   *
112   * @return the feedthrough matrix D.
113   */
114  public Matrix<Outputs, Inputs> getD() {
115    return m_D;
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Returns an element of the feedthrough matrix D.
120   *
121   * @param row Row of D.
122   * @param col Column of D.
123   * @return The feedthrough matrix D at (i, j).
124   */
125  public double getD(int row, int col) {
126    return m_D.get(row, col);
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Computes the new x given the old x and the control input.
131   *
132   * <p>This is used by state observers directly to run updates based on state estimate.
133   *
134   * @param x The current state.
135   * @param clampedU The control input.
136   * @param dtSeconds Timestep for model update.
137   * @return the updated x.
138   */
139  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
140  public Matrix<States, N1> calculateX(
141      Matrix<States, N1> x, Matrix<Inputs, N1> clampedU, double dtSeconds) {
142    var discABpair = Discretization.discretizeAB(m_A, m_B, dtSeconds);
143
144    return (discABpair.getFirst().times(x)).plus(discABpair.getSecond().times(clampedU));
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Computes the new y given the control input.
149   *
150   * <p>This is used by state observers directly to run updates based on state estimate.
151   *
152   * @param x The current state.
153   * @param clampedU The control input.
154   * @return the updated output matrix Y.
155   */
156  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
157  public Matrix<Outputs, N1> calculateY(Matrix<States, N1> x, Matrix<Inputs, N1> clampedU) {
158    return m_C.times(x).plus(m_D.times(clampedU));
159  }
160
161  @Override
162  public String toString() {
163    return String.format(
164        "Linear System: A\n%s\n\nB:\n%s\n\nC:\n%s\n\nD:\n%s\n",
165        m_A.toString(), m_B.toString(), m_C.toString(), m_D.toString());
166  }
167}
